name: Normandy VS Reaper
description:
Mass Effect parody, pilot the Normandy and fight your way against the Geth to destroy Sovereign.

Game made by Kevin Glez Vera as final project for an Unity grade.

Music belongs to EA/Bioware, I am nothing but another ME fan.

Models downloaded from 3DWarehouse.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Space to shoot.

Arrows or wasd to move

The renegade button pauses the game and the paragon one resumes it.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
